basic_information.scholarship_name: Patrick E. Case Endowed Scholarship in Mathematics
basic_information.committee_name: CMS - Mathematics and Statistics Scholarship Commi

description: The recipient(s) of the Patrick E. Case Endowed Scholarship in Mathematics will be selected by a committee appointed by the Dean of the College of Mathematics and Science and will include representatives from the Department of Mathematics and Statistics. The recipient(s) will be selected in the spring for distribution the following fall and/or spring semesters. Eligibility Criteria Preference given to a Junior undergraduate student majoring in Mathematics Education Must be enrolled full-time

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_Major_2 is Mathematics Education   or SIS_Major is Mathematics Education   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Mathematics Education   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Mathematics Education
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Major_2 is Mathematics Education   or SIS_Major is Mathematics Education   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Mathematics Education   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Mathematics Education
